features: 100% natural cotton – Our Tampons are made from GMO-free 100% Natural Cotton and are 100% biodegradable, hypoallergenic, dermatologically and Gynecologically tested.
Designed for comfort - Customers have reported less discomfort when using Veeda products. Veeda tampons absorb faster than synthetic tampons, designed and manufactured with comfort in mind.
Reduces risk of toxic shock syndrome - Oxygen cleansing creates a chlorine and pesticide FREE product, ensuring only 100% pure GMO-Free, natural cotton touches your body.
Dermatologically tested – Veeda tampons are hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested. Our tampons are pesticide, dioxin, chemical, chlorine, dye, fragrance and synthetic FREE.
Functional and comfortable - Veeda applicator tampons feature a BPA-Free plastic applicator, strong and reliable 100% cotton string and are healthy, safe, effective and irritation free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT VEEDA We created Veeda because you and your body deserve the best. No harsh chemicals here — just natural goodness that always goes with the flow (literally).

Better for You No Chemicals. No Synthetics. No Dyes. Our tampons are 100% natural GMO-free cotton and are hypoallergenic with compact BPA-free applicators. Better for the planet Our tampons are and packaged using recyclable** materials. Veeda is committed to sustainably-sourced ingredients and safe manufacturing. *made from 100% cotton **material used for the packaging is cardboard which is biodegrdable Better for all We’re working to end period poverty once and for all. Every time you buy a Veeda product, you help us deliver period care essentials to those who need them the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thank you for these
reviews.reviewText: Like knowing these are organic cotton. Now my friends want to order some. The wrappers are ugly colors but the box designs are natural looking and adorable. The tampons are good quality tampons. Hold blood as good as any good tampon. Thank you. ...would love if they came out with a cute natural looking tampon holder purse push or something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Need longer applicator
reviews.reviewText: While I love the all natural no chemicals this product needs a longer applicator. It’s too short to push the tampon out of the plastic applicator

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Recommend These Tampons!
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend these tampons! They work just as well as Tampax Pearl, but without the added chemicals. I like their ecofriendly packaging, and their compact design (they can easily fit in small clutches). I haven't had any discomfort using them and recommend making the switch if you're looking for a natural tampon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took extra effort to keep the applicator together when you pull it open before insertion, then, would not come off the tampon when inserting, pulling it back out. would be better product without any applicator at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Natural and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Comfortable, easy to use. Doesn't irritate sensitive tissue.Cons: very loud wrapper, not quite as absorbent as other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tampons ever
reviews.reviewText: Best tampons ever, unlike others brands this one does not have a cardboard applicator, it has a plastic applicator which works so much better! My go to brand! Love the lite ones all the way to the super plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: I regret buying these- not to be tmi but the applicator to push up is not long enough- the tampon doesn’t leave the applicator. Never buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! It's especially great knowing that veeda products ...
reviews.reviewText: Great product! It's especially great knowing that veeda products aren't saturated with genotoxins! I thought the migraines toward the end of my period were caused naturally. But they stopped after using these tampons. Thank you Veeda
